trigger_floordancer_0_isdancing_false.helper: This trigger will be triggered when the value of the key of custom variable is the same that trigger value. Operator can be =, !=, contains, empty, notempty
trigger_floordancer_0_isdancing_false.comment: Check for isdancing variable to be false
trigger_floordancer_0_isdancing_false.name: check_variable

trigger_floordancer_0_is_spawned.helper: This trigger will be triggered when a entity is spawned
trigger_floordancer_0_is_spawned.comment: Guessing it checks if dancer is spawned?
trigger_floordancer_0_is_spawned.name: entity_is_spawn

trigger_floordancer_0_routine_active.helper: This trigger will be triggered when the value of the key of custom variable is the same that trigger value. Operator can be =, !=, contains, empty, notempty
trigger_floordancer_0_routine_active.name: check_variable

action.helper: This action will wait x second before perform the next action
action.comment: Do not start too early otherwise it may cause issues for a fresh spawn.
action.name: wait_second

trigger_floordancer_0_isdancing_false.helper: This trigger will be triggered when the value of the key of custom variable is the same that trigger value. Operator can be =, !=, contains, empty, notempty
trigger_floordancer_0_isdancing_false.name: check_variable

action.name: move
action.helper: This action will move an entity with several custom parameter
action.help: This action will move an entity with several custom parameter
action.position_change_helper:
Write 'current' in position_tag for get current node,mappin, fasttravel, custom_place or custom_room. 
 For poi if you write 'current' in position_poi_district you will get the current district, 
 if you write 'current in position_poi_subdistrict you will get the current subdistrict. 
 also if you write 'random' in position_poi_subdistrict or position_poi_district, you will get an 'random' value

trigger.name: entity_at_position
trigger.position_change_helper:
Write 'current' in position_tag for get current node,mappin, fasttravel, custom_place or custom_room. 
 For poi if you write 'current' in position_poi_district you will get the current district, 
 if you write 'current in position_poi_subdistrict you will get the current subdistrict. 
 also if you write 'random' in position_poi_subdistrict or position_poi_district, you will get an 'random' value
trigger.helper: This trigger will be triggered when a custom entity is at position

action.helper: This action will wait that the trigger is valid before do the next action
action.name: wait_for_trigger
action.help: Wait that trigger condition is valid

action.name: teleport
action.comment: Teleport to bar so arm is correctly aligned during animation
action.help: This action will teleport an entity with several custom parameter
action.position_change_helper:
Write 'current' in position_tag for get current node,mappin, fasttravel, custom_place or custom_room. 
 For poi if you write 'current' in position_poi_district you will get the current district, 
 if you write 'current in position_poi_subdistrict you will get the current subdistrict. 
 also if you write 'random' in position_poi_subdistrict or position_poi_district, you will get an 'random' value
action.helper: This action will teleport an entity with several custom parameter
This action will wait x ticks. before perform the next action (60 ticks = 1 sec approx)
action.comment: Wait a couple of ticks so animation starts from teleported place
action.name: wait_tick

action.helper: This action will stop animation to entity
action.name: stop_anim_entity
play_custom_anim_entity
action.helper: This action will apply animation to entity
